Package game.entity

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entity.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a helper class for 2d coordinates (0,0) is the bottom left corner when displayed.
    Author:
    callum
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
